items.sentence: It\'s not Tom who needs protection. It\'s me.
Did you buy the painting you were looking at?
Did you do anything interesting last weekend?
Tom put the dirty dishes in the kitchen sink.
Would Tom accept your help if you offered it?
Would anyone mind if I turned on some lights?
Would you go to Boston if you had the chance?
We met while we were both visiting Australia.
We need to let our students be more creative.
I found this ring on the street this morning.
I can never get my son to eat any vegetables.
Tom seems to be unwilling to lower the price.
Tom sensed something bad was going to happen.
I thought I was never going to see Tom again.
I\'ve promised Tom I wouldn\'t do that again.
Tom says he doesn\'t have time to swim today.
Tom says he isn\'t willing to take any risks.
Tom usually only wears glasses when he reads.
Tom wanted Mary to tell him her phone number.
Mary wouldn\'t tell me her boyfriend\'s name.
Tom is the only one who isn\'t angry at Mary.
Are you sure you want to continue doing this?
Tom speaks three languages, including French.
Tom spends too much time playing video games.
I had plenty of time to talk to many friends.
I hardly ever see this kind of thing anymore.
Put the gun down and move away from the desk.
I\'d appreciate it if you\'d help me do this.
Some people find this kind of thing annoying.
Someone told me that Tom now lives in Boston.
Sooner or later, Tom will tell me everything.
I\'m very surprised that you don\'t know Tom.
I\'m looking forward to your Halloween party.
When was the last time that you went camping?
When was the last time this room was cleaned?
I have a gut feeling that that won\'t happen.
Tom told me that he would be here about 2:30.
Tom told me this would only take three hours.
Tom and I both don\'t speak French very well.
The sun is out, but it\'s still cold outside.
Tom is the best French speaker in our family.
Tom is the best player the team has ever had.
Tom is the last person I want to talk to now.
Tom didn\'t know Mary couldn\'t speak French.
I\'m tired of eating at the school cafeteria.
I want the rest of the money that you owe me.
I want you to help me do that this afternoon.
Are there many poisonous snakes in Australia?
We\'ve looked everywhere and can\'t find Tom.
I can\'t believe it\'s been more than a year.
